EXAMPLES.TITLE: Research Support Technician
EXAMPLES.SUBTITLE: CITIC - Research Center for ICT
EXAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Leadership in digitalization projects in the naval sector, coordinating teams for the development of technological components, analyzing industry-specific requirements, and integrating innovative solutions to optimize industrial processes.

EXAMPLES.TITLE: Software Developer
EXAMPLES.SUBTITLE: Enxenio
EXAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Development of mobile applications for iOS and Android, with full involvement in the entire development lifecycle. Constant communication with the client and teamwork to ensure product delivery.

EXAMPLES.TITLE: Collaboration Scholarship in University Departments
EXAMPLES.SUBTITLE: University of A Coruña
EXAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: In charge of the methodological study for improving fundus images with deep learning. Data management to optimize processing accuracy, evaluating and validating images for ophthalmological diagnosis.

EXAMPLES.LABEL: Repository of the project La Velada del Año IV, it will open in a new tab.
EXAMPLES.SUBTITLE: Official website
EXAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Contribution to the development of the website for the boxing event between streamers and content creators, organized by Ibai Llanos. The initiative was developed as an open-source project under the direction of Miguel Ángel Durán.
EXAMPLES.IMAGE_ALT: Screenshot of the website of La Velada del Año IV.

EXAMPLES.LABEL: Repository of the project Temzone, it will open in a new tab.
EXAMPLES.SUBTITLE: Interactive map of Temtem
EXAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Development of a cross-platform solution for desktop and mobile devices, designed as an interactive map for the video game Temtem. The project was awarded 3rd place in the 16th Edition of the A Noite Awards.

ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.IMAGE_ALT: Profile picture of Diego Ramil López.
ABOUT.P1: I'm a computer engineer from the University of A Coruña. Since November 2022, I've been developing my professional career in the software industry. A significant part of my work has been focused on full-stack development, so I'm comfortable with backend tasks, although my real strength is in frontend development.
ABOUT.P2: Based on my past experience, my main programming languages are Kotlin and JavaScript/TypeScript, although at the beginning of my career, I also worked with Python. Of course, I'm proficient in HTML and CSS, which allows me to create well-structured layouts. I'm also familiar with cloud solutions like AWS and Google Cloud. While I've worked with these technologies, I'm always eager to learn new tools.
